```{python}
# %load_ext autoreload

import pandas as pd
import scanpy.api as sc
import numpy as np
import sys
sys.path.append("lib")
from jupytertools import setwd
from scio import concatenate
sys.path.append("../scanorama")
import scanorama
import os.path
import gc

```

```{python}
INPUT_FILE = r.params['input_file']
OUT_FILE = r.params['output_file']
```

```{python}
adata_merged = sc.read(INPUT_FILE)
```

```{python}
datasets = adata_merged.obs["dataset"].values.unique()
```

```{python}
adatas = [adata_merged[adata_merged.obs["dataset"] == dataset,:].copy() for dataset in datasets]
```

```{python run_scanorama}
integrated, corrected = scanorama.correct_scanpy(adatas, return_dimred=True, batch_size=50000)
```

```{python}
adata_corrected = concatenate(corrected)
```

```{python}
adata_corrected.obsm["X_scanorama"] = np.vstack(integrated)
```

```{python}
sc.pp.scale(adata_corrected)
```

```{python pca}
sc.tl.pca(adata_corrected, svd_solver='arpack')
```

```{python}
sc.pl.pca(adata_corrected, color=["dataset", "n_genes", "n_counts", "percent_mito", "phase", "patient", "origin", "platform"], ncols=2)
```

```{python neighbors}
sc.pp.neighbors(adata_corrected, n_neighbors=10, use_rep="X_scanorama")
```

```{python umap}
sc.tl.umap(adata_corrected)
```

```{python}
sc.pl.umap(adata, color=["dataset", "n_genes", "n_counts", "percent_mito", "phase", "patient", "origin", "platform"], ncols=2)
```

```{python store_output}
adata_corrected.save(OUT_FILE)
adata_corrected.save_csvs(os.basename(OUT_FILE))
```
